-- table UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran') BEGIN PRINT 'Create table UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran' CREATE TABLE [dbo].UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran( [CompanyID] [int] NOT NULL ,[PMReassignmentID] [nvarchar] (10) NOT NULL ,[SourceTranID] [bigint] NOT NULL ,[TranID] [bigint] NOT NULL ,[NoteID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL ,[CreatedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL ,[Tstamp] [timestamp] NULL ,[CreatedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL ,[CreatedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CompanyID] ASC, [PMReassignmentID] ASC, [SourceTranID] ASC, [TranID] ASC ) WITH ( PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON ))
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_PMTran_UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran] FOREIGN KEY([CompanyID], [SourceTranID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[PMTran] ([CompanyID], [TranID]) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_PMTran_UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_PMTran_UsrPMCostReassignmentTran] FOREIGN KEY([CompanyID], [TranID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[PMTran] ([CompanyID], [TranID]) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[UsrPMCostReassignmentSourceTran] CHECK CONSTRAINT [FK_PMTran_UsrPMCostReassignmentTran]
END
